title: Effects of an increase in net investment

content.description:
In answering the question, you should emphasize the line of reasoning that generated your results; it is not enough to list the results of your analysis. Include correctly labeled diagrams, if useful or required, in explaining your answer. A correctly labeled diagram must have all axes and curves clearly labeled and must show directional changes.

Assume that an economy is at full employment.

Explain how an increase in net investment will affect each of the following.

Aggregate demand

Capital stock

Long-run aggregate supply

Output

Explain how the increase in net investment will affect the country's production possibilities curve shown below.
content.question: Respond to all parts of the question.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question.

topic.text: 1.2: Opportunity Cost and the Production Possibilities Curve (PPC)

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
